item.title: Lucy Letby will not face further criminal charges
item.description: Former nurse Lucy Letby is serving 15 whole-life terms.

item.title: Full messages shared between Trump and European leaders
item.description: A series of text messages between US President Donald Trump and European leaders have been shared publicly.

item.title: Chinese mega-embassy approved by government after debate over security risks
item.description: Critics of the project - including some Labour MPs - warn it could pose a security risk.

item.title: Why does Trump want Greenland and what could it mean for Nato and the EU?
item.description: The US president's repeated demands to control Greenland could threaten the Nato military alliance.

item.title: 'Modelled on a jellyfish' - Osaka backs up 'spectacular' outfit with win
item.description: How Naomi Osaka's jellyfish-inspired outfit stole the show in her hard-fought Australian Open first-round win over Antonia Ruzic.
